alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 16 at 10:42AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clay and northeastern Dunklin Counties through 1130 AM CST... At 1041 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Corning, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Malden, Piggott, Corning, Campbell, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, Clarkton, Holcomb, St. Francis, Pollard, McDougal, Saint Francis, Glennonville, Crockett, Hickoria, Valley Ridge, Providence, Morris State Park, Wilhelmina, Brian and Chalk Bluff Battlefield Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
